1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdur-Rahman bin Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri from his father that:The Messenger of Allah said: "No woman should look at the nakedness of another woman, and no man should look at the nakedness of another man

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَرَى عَوْرَةَ أَخِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of seeing one’s brother’s private areas
